title: Warriors center Zaza Pachulia sidelined at least a week - NBA - ESPN
snippet: Pachulia said he knew he had hurt his shoulder on the play but finished the game. Once he cooled down, he noticed the pain. "It's not bad for him to miss a few games here and get some rest," coach Steve Kerr said. "He's definitely going to miss the next several games and we'll go from there. I don't think it's anything that's going to linger too long." He has made big strides since mid-December, so this is a minor setback -- though Pachulia is determined to make it a positive and use the time while receiving treatment to stay in shape and work to get stronger.

title: Zaza Pachulia NBA Stats & News
snippet: His averages of 5.4 points, 4.7 rebounds and 1.6 assists were all down from a season prior, extending a three-year trend of shrinking production. With the Warriors set to move on from Pachulia, the big man now joins the Pistons on a one-year deal for the veteran's minimum.
